page.title: 03LIMBOURNE PARK FARM MUNDON
page.content: {Limbourne Park Farm }was founded in the 1100's.The farm is owned by Mr.and Mrs Carr.They enjoy living there because it is quiet and peaceful.They own 91 acres of land.30 of the acres are used for their farm animals,61 acres are used for cereal crops.In 1984,last year their best crop was peas.They also grow Barley and Wheat.In the recent past they have lost 2/3 of the hedges,from Dutch Elm Disease.The house has a wooden beam, which holds up the ceiling.The beam was an old ship's mast.Around part of the house is a moat,which may have been used to keep animals out.There are 5 wells.The{livestock}they own are sheep,cows,horses and dogs.they also have pheasants,peacocks and doves. Mr.&Mrs.Carr also own Livery and Riding Stables.
